descriptionlist.description: A simple yet elegant way of waching anime on your favorite anime website. NineAnimator is a free and open source anime watching app for iOS. Currently it supports 9anime.ru and masterani.me.
NineAnimator currently supports the following video sources: RapidVideo, Mp4Upload, Streamango, MyCloud(unavailable for Google Cast), and Tiwi.Kiwi(may not be available for Google Cast)
This application only supports iOS 11.2 and above.
This tweak was created by Marcus Zhou and is open source! Check it out: https://github.com/SuperMarcus/NineAnimator
